ygData.subject: RE: Kithicor Lore was Adventure vacations levels 12-15  *spoilers*
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, I have heard those guards.  Have not done the Clothspinner quest. Also, talk to the female bard merch just inside West Karana on the Qeynos side.  She
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, I have heard those guards. Have not done the Clothspinner quest.
Also, talk to the female bard merch just inside West Karana on the Qeynos
side. She mentions a Guard by name and tells you that he is doing something
bad.

Also, if you hang around long enough in the Qey bard guild - a npc comes in
and tells a tale and plays a new song he has written.

And then there is the whole business with the Irontoes. Trumpy who hangs
out in Fish's Ale (extermely brazen when there is such a bounty on his head)
and Crumpy who patrols in QH and Tumpy who is in the inn in Kaladim.

Hmmm, and why so many DE nastys? Dorn, Dvinn, Gix, Zixx or Nixx (the Paw
DE)- any others?

Who is Branick Notai? Ever read the note you deliver to Gnasher. What
note? Have you ever axed the bartender in the back of Fish's Ale if he ever
[runs low] or [running low] on BB Stouts? Sometimes he will mention it to
get you started but if not just axe him about his inventory...

Sylly.

-----Original Message-----
From: Jones, Brian [mailto:brian.jones@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 1:37 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Kithicor Lore was Adventure
vacations levels 12-15 *spoilers*

From: "Jones, Brian" <brian.jones@...>

There is an underlying story. Try talking to the
Clothspinner woman in
North Qeynos and delivering the note to her sister. See
what happens after
you do. Or actually hang out around the front gates and
listen to the
guards. Another one will come up and start talking to the
other one and
then return where he came from. See where he goes and look
around....

There is more to the game than hack and slash, I assure you.



> ----------
> From: James Schuldes[SMTP:jgs@...]
> Reply To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 1:28 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Kithicor Lore was Adventure
vacations levels
> 12-15 *spoilers*
>
> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> Ok, now you have me hooked. I HATE Kithicor! It is the
most scary place
> I
> have been - so far. But I keep going back! I have had
Ged make me his
> Bearskin gloves and am looking for a HQ LION to get the
finest ones in all
> of Norrath. Jed's druid friend - she won't talk to me not
even with my
> cha
> song.
>
> Is anyone keeping track of the various inter-twining of
these kind of
> things?
>
> For example, talking to Furball Miller on the Miller farm.
His sad story
> of
> woe. Then, there is the letter from the DE that the
halfling in the
> Hogcallers Inn has (part of the Lady Shae quest.) I got
the letter and
> read
> it. It implies that you can get a special thing if you
deliver it to the
> correct person.
>
> I wonder if there is some underlying tale about Norrath or
are these just
> independent little quest things.
>
> Sylly.
> -----Original Message-----

[mailto:elijah@...]

> Heehee! What the "Levelquest" people miss in
their mad dash
> to "win"!
>
> >I adventured there for more than a few
levels, and I still
> get a kick out of
> >that dark place...Have you ever met
Kithicor himself? I
> saw him once by the
> >cabin with the grizzley bears and the flag.
He didn't say
> much...
>
>
>
> Want to hear some suspicions?
>
> I think Ged and his Girlfriend (not
recalling he name) are
> either dead (we are talking to their
> ghosts) or cursed. He (or she, likely she)
may be a
> werewolf. I think they had a nice little house
> in the Kithicor until it was burned down or
destroyed in
> some manner.
>
> That lake, that lake *sigh* there is
something UP with it
> (besides two piranha).
>
> Anyway we have a bunch of really weird data
points about it,
> which might be random, but might NOT
> be.
>
> Truth is out there
> :o)
> Tszaaz
